mapper.select: select t1.keyid , t1.datatime , t1.allmsg , t1.objection , t1.objectiontime , t1.create_time , t1.modify_time , t1.fk_id from ext_law_person_tax t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ext_law_person_tax t1 set t1.keyid =#{dto.keyid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.datatime =#{dto.datatime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.allmsg =#{dto.allmsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.objection =#{dto.objection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.objectiontime =#{dto.objectiontime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.modify_time =systimestamp, t1.fk_id =#{dto.fkId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_law_person_tax t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update ext_law_person_tax t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
